text: @NYGovCuomo @realDonaldTrump @seanhannity @SpeakerPelosi @SenSchumer I hear the cries from the crematorium cries from the grave. The hubris involved to block life saving COVID meds and not prefer the Drs opinion. You r killing 10’s of 1,000’s & tearing ur life down with ur own hands #COVID19
